channel.title: El 'Happy (made with only prims) V2 added
channel.description:
views V1 [code][img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/3483/lineview.png[/img] [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4747/swordv1.png[/img] [img]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/46/swordv2.png[/img][/code]
please rate and if oyu have any ideas what to change id be happy to change it
( ps it is sharp XD... just one side is buffed and the other is sharp )
V2 - worked out crapness made blade bigger... and made blade a bit... not crappier the hilt looks better, hilt is now black sword is still silver
[img]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/9938/sword3lv.png[/img] [img]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/3407/sword2o.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/6398/sword1i.png[/img]
Got all the faces working XD...
Blade has bin strait nd

item.title: El 'Happy (made with only prims) V2 added
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

i know XD… XD keep in mind this is like my first prim sword O_o… i usely just draw ideas on a piece of paper and trace XD thats hwy my others are beter then this…

Read full topic

item.title: El 'Happy (made with only prims) V2 added
item.dc:creator: @tyang8 tyang8
item.description:
@tyang8 wrote:

is it just me or is the blade slanted. i give 5/10. if u look at the wire frame the lines dont match up. when using primitives u should just click on one and move it to where u like and do the same to the other points with the same x,y,z, anyway its sort of good.

name= The Sword of Happiness

lol dont know if it a good name or not

Read full topic
